function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection of the air and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement effective UVGI systems and increase air movement for better mixing","Technologies":"UV lamps, fans, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of UVGI surface disinfection","Impact":"Risk of incomplete disinfection of high-frequency touch surfaces and medical devices","Mitigation":"Use UVGI as a complement to physical cleaning methods, especially for surfaces where conventional methods are not feasible","Technologies":"UV lamps, physical cleaning methods","People":"Healthcare staff and facility managers","Owner":"Infection control teams, facility management"}]}
